Header.Title: if Enum.TryParse
Header.Description: if statement with condition whether Enum.TryParse method returns true.
Header.Author: Josef Pihrt

Literal.ToolTip: The type of the value to parse

Snippet.Code: Dim $result$ As $type$ If Enum.TryParse($value$, $result$) $end$ End If

Header.Title: if not Enum.TryParse
Header.Description: if statement with condition whether Enum.TryParse method returns false.
Header.Author: Josef Pihrt

Literal.ToolTip: The type of the value to parse

Snippet.Code: Dim $result$ As $type$ If Not Enum.TryParse($value$, $result$) $end$ End If
